description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take your avatar to the skies in classic aerial dogfighting.  Unlock a variety of aircraft including helicopters, jets, and space ships.  Play offline against bots or online with up to 7 other players.  Shoot down enemy aircraft and destroy enemy buildings to win the round.
description.short: Take your avatar to the skies in classic aerial dogfighting.  Unlock a variety of aircraft including helicopters, jets, and space ships.  Play offline against bots or online with up to 7 other players.  Shoot down enemy aircraft and destroy enemy buildings to win the round.
